dialogStrings: Cosmo Canyon

{Red XIII}
I am home!
It is I, Nanaki!

Hey, Nanaki!
You're safe!{PAUSE}Come on, and say
hello to Bugenhagen!

{Cloud}
Nanaki?

Welcome to Cosmo Canyon.
Are you familiar with this land?
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No

Welcome to Cosmo Canyon.
Make yourselves at home.

You lied.
That is something that is not
treated lightly here in Cosmo Canyon.

Let me explain.{PAUSE}People from all over the
world gather here to seek the
Study of Planet Life.

{Barret}
Wooooooooo!

{Barret}
I always wanted to come here!

Ummgah!
I'm sorry it's full now,
so I can't let you enter.

{Red XIII}
They helped me
when I was on the road.
Please let them in.

Oh, is that so?
You helped our Nanaki?
Please, come in.

{Cloud}
Who is Nanaki?

Nanaki is Nanaki.
That's his name.

{Red XIII}
Leaving already?
You should get some rest.

Since you're here, why don't
you listen to Bugenhagen's story?

Leaving already?
But it appears your friends still want
to learn more about the Planet

Did you get to see Bugenhagen's contraption?
If you haven't yet, you must!

Hm? If you're looking for Bugenhagen,
he went to the Sealed Door.{PAUSE}Remember, there's a steel door
on the way to Bugenhagen's room.{PAUSE}What's that door there for anyhow?
It's been closed forever

Oh, it's you.
This is terrible.
The color of that unlucky star{PAUSE}The children are all so scared that
they won't even go outside.{PAUSE}I'd rather not see it either

Bugenhagen seems rather down
ever since he returned from that trip.{PAUSE}I'm worried something might
happen to Bugenhagen now of all times

Nanaki, it's really bad.
Ever since Bugenhagen returned from that last
trip, he doesn't seem well.{PAUSE}Why don't you hurry and see Bugenhagen?

Bugenhagen is what keeps
our hearts strong

{Red XIII}
Here is where I wasI mean,
this is my hometown.

{Red XIII}
My tribe were protectors of those
who appreciate this beautiful
canyon and the Planet.

{Red XIII}
My brave mother fought and died here,
but my cowardly father left her
I am the last of my race.

{Cloud}
Cowardly father?

{Red XIII}
Yes.
My father was a wastrel.

{Red XIII}
And so the mission I inherited from
my ancestors is to protect this place.
My journey ends here.

Hey! Nanaki--!
You're home!

{Red XIII}
Coming, Grandpa!

{Barret}
Good timin'.
Let's take a breather.{PAUSE}I got stuff I want to
find out, too.

{Tifa}
That's perfect.
Why don't we take a break too?
We can meet back here in a while, OK?

{Aeris}
Let's rest for a bit.
There are some things I want
to find out about anyway.

{Yuffie}
Rest, rest, rest!
I wanna rest!
Ok! That's that!

{Cait Sith}
I'm just dead tired.
Everyone, how 'bout some rest?

Yaaay!
Nanaki!
Nanaki's back!
It's all thanks to this flame!

This fire is called 'Cosmo Candle'.
It has burned for generations.{PAUSE}It is a holy flame
that protects this canyon.{PAUSE}I've heard it only went out once,
long ago.

The elders said something horrifying
occurred, but I really
don't know much else about it.

So this is Cosmo Canyon
Quite a mysterious place.{PAUSE}Have you come to seek the
'Study of Planet Life'?
{CHOICE}That's it
{CHOICE}No

Oh yeah?
What? The car broke down!?

Why don't you look around Cosmo Canyon
while I fix the car?

Please get some rest while
I fix your car.

The repair on your car is completed.{PAUSE}Now you should be able to go
wherever you want.
{CHOICE}How much do I owe?
{CHOICE}Much obliged

No charge!
You'd do the same for me, right?
{CHOICE}Please, take 1000 gil
{CHOICE}I guess you're right

You don't even have that much.
Don't tease me, okay?

Are you sure?
Well, all right. Thank you.{PAUSE}Oh yeah.
Did you stay at the inn already?{PAUSE}There was a bottle on the sofa there a
couple of days agowas it yours?

Oh, really?{PAUSE}There really isn't much
else to see here.

Yeah?
I heard there's an awesome observatory here.
I'd like to see it if I have a chance.
Whoa!!

Don't scare me like that.
I almost fell over.

Nanaki, are you leaving again?
We want you to stay here forever

Mmm
I think the teachings of
the 'Study of Planet Life' are true.{PAUSE}But can people used to
Mako energy ever go back?

Mmm
I can't stand here talking about the
'Study of Planet Life'.{PAUSE}I think I'll head
back to my homeland now

Oh, Nanaki's with you.
Make yourselves at home.

{Red XIII}
Wait for me! I'm coming too!

{Cloud}
Mmm?

Bugenhagen
{Cloud}.
Please look after Nanaki.

{Cloud}
What happened?

{Red XIII}
I think I grew up a little.
That's what happened!

Bugenhagen
Ho Ho Hoooo.
Come back whenever you
need my knowledge.

Tasty Cocktails!
Pub "Starlet"{PAUSE}Fluffy Beds!
In "Shildra Inn"{PAUSE}Come in today!{PAUSE}It's right near Cosmo Candle!

{Aeris}
CosmoCanyon?
I wonder if there's any relation
to the planet or the Ancients

{Barret}
I finally made it
So this isCosmo Canyon!

{Tifa}
{Red XIII}
seems different, doesn't he?

{Yuffie}
Hmmm
Any Materia?
Any Materia around?

{Cait Sith}
HmmmSo this is
Cosmo Canyon.
